Question
========
In R, the **working directory** is best described as

Answerlist
----------
* the folder where R is installed
* the default folder R uses to read/write files unless you it give a path
* the folder where your Quarto file is saved
* the folder where RStudio stores its settings

Solution
========
The working directory is the default location for file input/output when you use relative paths (e.g., `read.csv("data/file.csv")`).
